text: Boomerang is a 2015 French drama film directed by François Favrat and starring Laurent Lafitte, Mélanie Laurent, Audrey Dana and Wladimir Yordanoff. It is an adaptation of Tatiana de Rosnay's novel A Secret Kept (alternative title:Boomerang). The film was released in theatres on 23 September 2015. == Cast == * Laurent Lafitte as Antoine Rey * Mélanie Laurent as Agathe Rey * Audrey Dana as Angèle * Wladimir Yordanoff as Charles Rey * Bulle Ogier as Blanche Rey * as Astrid * as Anne-Sophie * as Bernadette * Angèle Garnier as Margaux * Kate Moran as Jean * as Clarisse * Rose Favrat as Rose * Lou-Ann Opéron as Pauline * Eriq Ebouaney as The psychiatrist == References == == External links == * Category:2015 films Category:2015 drama films Category:French-language films Category:French drama films Category:French films Category:Films based on French novels Category:Films directed by François Favrat Category:French LGBT-related films Category:2015 LGBT-related films Category:LGBT-related drama films
title: Boomerang (2015 film)
